pullrequest.title: Issue 182: Add optional bash script sourcing before executing a task

content.raw:
Please note: one of the refactors of this PR was to take code from vrc_contest.py (200 lines) and put it in a new task.py file (with appropriate imports).
So the code in task.py is not new, and can be reviewed swiftly.
